name: Color Trip (Nanref)
description:
Description

Travel through the planets recovering the color you lost in the past. Will darkness reach you before you complete your mission?

Assets I didn’t make

Fonts:

Simplisicky Fill: https://www.dafont.com/simplisicky.font

Agency FB: https://fonts.adobe.com/fonts/agency-fb#fonts-section

Sounds:

Menu and ending music: https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/249405/

Jump: https://www.zapsplat.com/music/game-jump-tone/

Teleport: https://freesound.org/people/Leszek_Szary/sounds/172206/

Step: https://freesound.org/people/pgi/sounds/211457/

Landing and eyes: http://dustyroom.com/free-casual-game-sounds/

Die: https://freesound.org/people/Mrguff/sounds/369711/

This game was made for The BlackthornProd Game Jam #2.
